column5: WELL THE TIME OF THE YR I HAVE DREADED IS HERE FOR ME!!! NO NOT WORK !! NO FISH  LOL!!! YESTERDAY AND TODAY I COVERED 3 TRIBS AND ONLY MANAGED 1 FISH!!! 99% OF THE RUN IS UP I'M SURE!!! REAL WARM TEMPS THIS WEEKEND SHOULD REALLY PUT THEM IN A SPAWNING MOOD!! GUESS I'LL JUST HAVE TO PUT MY ROD DOWN AND WAIT FOR OPENER LIKE EVERYONE ELSE GUESS I GOT THIS WEEK TO DO THE THINGS MY WIFE ASKED ME TO DO IN JANUARY  LOL!!!

Wait a minute....one fish over two days?  That means there was a ssss....ummm a sk....I cant even say it (that smelly animal)...oh man...the whole fabric of my reality has just been shaken up!!!  I can understand a smelly animal in January...but...I'm speechless.  If you aren't gonna try, then I guess I wont bother either....LOL.  Tried some fishing yesterday and all I caught were two suckers...guess I should consider myself lucky!!!
CC getting skunked = me retiring the pin for a couple of weeks dusting off the golf clubs.
A skunkl for CC is probably less than five
Same for me CC. Last three trips have been the biggest waste of roe ever.  damn suckers...
Hunny Do List ....i can't see that lasting all week LOL...

This is UNREAL! I've either been busy, or sick for the last few weekends, and I couldn't wait to go out to the tribes. With all the steelhead pics on this web for the last 2 weeks, my anxiety was about to burst. Two days ago, I finally received my copy of the Steelheading -  Jim Butler. Tell you the truth, I really don’t like reading, but I was reading this book like there’s no tomorrow, even with my 39*C fever. Just yesterday, I was planning to hit the tribes on Friday morning and practice some of the stuff taught in the book. One of the few Fridays where I don’t have school. Now, CC is putting down his rod… What chance is there for me. This sucks, I guess I should just sleep-in and recover 100% from the flu.
hope ya feel better soon bro!!! a good book to keep ya company too  lol well ya never know ya might hit a straggler!!!

well scott ...i am dissapointed in you oh my god only 1 fish...well you better get right back out there and i want to see an improvement...lol..lol. just kidding,oh well you did at least get 1...cheers
Can you make it to the opener?
